text: {{Infobox person | name = Roger Carel | image = | caption = Carel (white hair) in Le Coma des Mortels (2002) | birth_name = Roger Bancharel | birth_date = | birth_place = Paris, France | death_date = | death_place = Aigre, France | other_names = | occupation = Actor, voice talent }} Roger Carel (born Roger Bancharel; 14 August 1927 - 11 September 2020) was a French actor. He was known for his role as Asterix, the French voice of Star Wars' C-3PO, and the French voice of Winnie-the-Pooh, Piglet, and Rabbit in Winnie the Pooh. He also voiced Wally Gator, Mickey Mouse, Yogi Bear, Kermit the Frog, Heathcliff, Foghorn Leghorn, ALF and many other famous characters in French. He was born in Paris, France. Carel died at his home in Aigre, France on 11 September 2020, aged 93.Mort de l’acteur, légende du doublage français, Roger Carel ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French voice actors Category:Actors from Paris
title: Roger Carel
